title: INDEX_OF
description: Returns the starting position (zero-based index) of the first occurrence of substring within string. The search is case-sensitive. If index_optional is provided, the search begins at the specified index. Returns -1 if the substring is not found.

parameters.name: index_optional
parameters.description: The zero-based index at which to start the search. Defaults to 0 if omitted.

examples:
INDEX_OF("hello world", "hello")
-- Returns 0 because the substring "hello"(case-sensitive) starts at the 0th position in the string.
-- Note: The index is based on a 0-based index (the first character is at position 0).

INDEX_OF("hello world", "Hello")
-- Returns -1 because "Hello" (uppercase 'H') is not present in "hello world" (lowercase 'h').
-- Case-sensitive search does not find a match.

INDEX_OF("hello world", "o", 5)
-- Returns 7 because the first occurrence of "o" starting from index 5 is at position 7.
-- Note: The start position and result use a 0-based index.
